website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 10.1 delivers a consistent and reliable Android big-screen tablet experience, but unless you're a Samsung loyalist, there are better values to be had.

customer_reviews.title: I believe that this is the best tablet on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This product is an iPad crusher. I have several iPads, iPhones, iPods and Mac computers. I love Apple products but this Samsung Tab 4 is better, faster, easier to use and comes with a host of standard features that Apple does not even have available such as opening most attachments, file system connectivity and what I love is the enhanced print features. Finally, there's the price. At half the price there is no question that this is the tablet to buy.
customer_reviews.author: EmeraldMeadows

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has changed my life I no longer have to got to the library To get online I have now purchased three (two I gave as gifts to friends) The price has dropped by $100 since then Excellent gift for loved ones! ( who have wifi ) PS the third one came in Korean, it was hard to make it English And the calendar still marks Korean holidays
customer_reviews.author: Can I be honest?

customer_reviews.title: A capable and reliable tablet computer
customer_reviews.text: We have had this about a year now, with no problems whatsoever. After problems with a variety of Apple and Windows laptop computers, my wife finds this easier to use, much more convenient, and more reliable. Although we sometimes use it with a wireless keyboard, most of the time we simply use on-screen typing. The Android OS (KitKat) is stable and problem-free, and the hardware has worked perfectly. The supplied browser has a few quirks, as does the optional Firefox, but on the whole the applications work well. Screen resolution and color rendition are excellent, and the built-in camera produces good pictures and video.
customer_reviews.author: Electronics for Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Battery never stayed charged/ bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: I got this and it looked great on the outside and screen was scratch free. I had trouble initially getting it to connect to wifi, so I did a factory reset and it worked...little did I know the worst was yet to come..the thing will not stay charged! Literally goes from 100 to cutting off in maybe 5 minutes. I contacted customer service and was told to contact Samsung bc they weren't gonna do anything....I've now had the thing a year and still have the same problem as Samsung has not been any help either. I have to use it while being connected to a charger at all times..total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: FallonZoey

customer_reviews.title: Blown Away!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet may just replace your laptop! As you can see it is in fact 10.1 with 16GB. Comes with a micro usb cable and a seprate wall outlet charger. Easy and fun to use. Camera is decent. Most used apps (Youtube, Google,etc.) Are pre loaded. Seems to be fairly user friendly and fast. Has an SD card slot. Pretty much everything you would need and expect. Also was rated number one in Consumer Reports. Really that is all you need to know I trust them. If you found my review helpful, please click below. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E.

customer_reviews.title: Totally love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this tablet. Very user friendly and great functionality. Have no problem with the screen display, bright clear colors and great picture quality. Expandable memory is a definitely plus when compared to the Apple Ipad as I can easily store all my movies, pics and videos on the tablet. Battery life has also been pretty good thus far. Still havent gotten chance to explorie all the functionalities, like hooking up to my samsung smart tv and stuff. Definitely worth the amazing price i got it for. Only complaint is that the cable for the charger is whey too short. But that is a minor issue. Great Tablet regardless.
customer_reviews.author: dandapper

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Korean version. Not all features can be rendered in US English.
customer_reviews.text: This is the Korean version. While you can switch the display language to a country specific version, e.g. US english, it always powers up into a Korean only mode. You have to know to type in your password to progress to the selected country function. The keyboard retains a Korean/English button and the ABC / Numeric button is in Korean always. Not as useful as getting a US version.
customer_reviews.author: RabiysRhyme

customer_reviews.title: A TABLET FOR ALL
customer_reviews.text: I know other people that bought the other well know brand, but I know others that bought this one and so happy I did. Very easy to get going and the only one thing I found frustrating is the instruction booklet has to be printed out, so I had my daughter do this at work. Will be using this more now that I have the instructions printed out. The price is great also. I am a medium type of computer person, email, surfing the web, games, etc. so I am not an expert and was able to use right away. Try it you won't regret.
customer_reviews.author: kewpielover

customer_reviews.title: Samsung quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: I still have a Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 10.1, that I've had for several years, I love it and its still going good. This Tab 4 is equally great. The only real difference I've noticed, is the external speakers on the Tab 4 are not as good as the Tab 2, but they both sound great with headphones. The only reason I purchased a new tablet, is because my husband started using it a few months ago and I can't get it away from him. He just left for two weeks in Africa and of course he just had to take it with him. He can't seem to live without it, but neither can I!
customer_reviews.author: S. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, nothing much compares.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife's birthday a year and 1/2 ago, thinking that she wanted a new tablet. Ultimately, I was forced to return this because she wanted a Microsoft Surface Pro instead. However, the short time that I did own this tablet I got to play with a few of the features and I wished that I could have kept it for myself. In my opinion, why spend the money for a iPAD when Samsung has everything you need in one gadget? I think I may revisit this tablet since my Nexus is starting to let me down lately.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: What more could you want from a tablet?
customer_reviews.text: This probably works as well as any tablet I can imagine. But then again, I'm not a huge tablet fan mostly because I don't like touch screens. Just too many fingerprints ALL the time. We use this mostly in the kitchen which just compounds that fingerprint problem. But the pros are, it comes on in a hurry, it's very light, the size is easy to read even for older eyes, the sound is just fine especially for news or TV-type viewing, seems to hold a charge for a long time, connects to Wi-Fi easily... I could go on. By now, they've probably upgraded this but if you're on the fence I'd recommend that you get it.
customer_reviews.author: Average Guy

customer_reviews.title: I bought this tablet in February 2015. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet in February 2015. It is now 18 months later and it takes hours and hours to charge, and then the battery is dead again within minutes. I have tried numerous chargers (cords and boxes) and different electrical outlets at home and at work, all the same result. Also, the headphone jack doesn't work anymore. It is basically worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Tesla

customer_reviews.title: The wife is very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a replacement for an iRulu that failed in the first 30 days of ownership. While the Galaxy Tab does cost more than the iRulu it replaced its over all quality and solid build makes the difference worthwhile. As far as my wife is concerned, she loves it. Not only does it give her some games to play but coupled with a Bluetooth keyboard she has found it works very well for her email and web browsing. The only con is the amount of bloatware that is on the device with no real way to delete it. However this problem is not confined to the Galaxy Tab and unfortunately is common across the industry.
customer_reviews.author: old programmer

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tablet to replace two 7" kindle fires one regular first generation 7" and one first generation 7" fire HD. both kindles still function and work perfectly but i need a bigger tablet and i wanted a more android type operating system. this tablet does it for me at a great price. the resolution is good same as the kindle fire HD and i had no problem with that. its faster and now i have access to the Google play store. I didn't go away from kindle I also have a kindle fire HDX 8.9 i recommend these products
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect down to a pixel.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome Samsung tablet. I will never even THINK of using an Apple iPad again, even if a future iteration of iPad is actually good. (I own an iPad 4). Samsung fit, finish, OS, support, apps, functionality, appearance, hardware, connectivity (especially connectivity) are excellent. Got mine in a Zagg folio. Savory rig. One thing. For art apps, you might find little erroneous areas in the touch screen that can't take a line. So move the art away from those minuscule areas and finish the line or color. For regular users you won't miss a pixel or two mal-touch-responsive.
customer_reviews.author: DrJohnsonCom

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 4
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tablet. It does everything I need it to do and it's the perfect size for watching videos, sending/checking emails, and keeping up with class assignments. I'm so glad that I purchased the Galaxy Tab 4 instead of buying another iPad. My iPad 3 totally stopped working after 3 years. It would not update or restore and is still stuck in recovery mode. I'm also glad that all of the applications I have on my Galaxy S 5 appeared on my tablet after signing in and I didn't have to download them. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Korean Made
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely a Samsung Tab 4, but it also set up for Koreans, yes you just change the language settings and it helps. But, there are other items that are totally different from what they sell in the US. I was extremely disappointed with my purchase, I ended up returning it, sadly! It was something I was truly excited about!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Angel

customer_reviews.title: It is still nice having all of the screen real estate though
customer_reviews.text: This tablet seems to be behind the times compared to Samsung's line of phones. It is still nice having all of the screen real estate though. The settings aren't as intuitive as you'd see on the Galaxy phones. Camera isn't as sharp either. My recommendation to make your battery last longer than 12 hours of idling is to shut off Wifi, Bluetooth and GPS when you're done using it. My tablet will now go a week before needing to be charged with light to medium use.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 10.1 tab can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.text: This tab replaces a three year old tab so there is quite a difference. My wife loves it and I don't blame her. It is really quick to respond and the picture is really pretty good. Great for movies and stuff like that. The speakers are pretty good also. I'm going to get me one it was a real good buy and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M Layton

customer_reviews.title: but i actually paid like $3 more to get it in one day that's ...
customer_reviews.text: Was SO SO SO anxious to get this. I have Prime so it only took 2 days, but i actually paid like $3 more to get it in one day that's how excited i was. I am SO IN LOVE with this tablet! Great quality to picture detail & fast internet browsing. Love watching my Netflix on here. I use FB & Instagram perfectly. DL games for my niece to play on. It's just absolutely perfect! I even purchased the SUPERNIGHT Ultra Thin Keyboard Case Cover. So i can type faster. LOVE it. Recommend for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Misleading and wrong charger
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect for the price until we received it and the charger wasn't even for the tablet. Didn't even have the words "Samsung" on the charger. Used a legit Samsung phone charger on it and it works, however, it takes half a damn day to charge it. Just for it to die after one hour of use. Refurbished my ass!
customer_reviews.author: Brelle McCormick

customer_reviews.title: the item is in very bad condition; scratches on the back
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!!! Item was DOA - so I had to use a seperate power adapter to charge up. And it appears to charge but will not turn on after charging. I don't think all the buttons work. ALSO, the item is in very bad condition; scratches on the back, front glass and corners - it looks abused! The online discription was totally misleading. I will be shipping this junk back today for a full refund. Worst Amazon purchase EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Jameson-Dallas,TX

customer_reviews.title: great device
customer_reviews.text: I am not at all techie so I can't spout forth with a lot of jargon and data, but what I can tell you is I love this thing. It's my first tablet so I don't have a personal basis for comparison, but it seems much better than the readers and tablets my friends have. I mainly use it for watching Netflix,HBO Showtime,etc. and I'm very impressed with the picture quality. It's the perfect size for personal viewing. While I mainly purchased it for viewing purposes,it's pretty much taken the place of my desktop PC. I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Flyingsolo

customer_reviews.title: After a couple of weeks I finally got acclimated to the rascal and realized it's pretty much an app-driven device
customer_reviews.text: Transitioning from a desktop to a tablet was a whole new (scary) concept for me as I know it's way different. After a couple of weeks I finally got acclimated to the rascal and realized it's pretty much an app-driven device. Still learning acquiring apps but all is well. Initial set up of the Samsung Galaxy was easy and packs a lot of power with it. It's got many features that I'll likely never use but there if I want to. Yes, it is a powerful tablet and delighted I made the purchase of this one as my first tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Rockin'Randall

customer_reviews.title: Very Good - Attn: Tablet Manufacturers - PLEASE READ THIS REIVEW
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Purchased it reconditioned. Time will tell, hence 4 stars. Battery life appears to be excellent. Streams Netflix, Hulu, etc. without hiccups. I use it mostly for streaming and the USB port is either on the top or bottom if you're watching in landscape which is a pain if the battery needs charging. A suggestion for ALL tablet makers: Provide TWO USB ports - one on the left or right side and one on the top or bottom. The user then has a choice depending on what you're using it for.
customer_reviews.author: Thos

customer_reviews.title: Great Samsung Galaxy Tablet
customer_reviews.text: My wife saw my Yoga 2 Tablet and she had to have a tablet, lol. She love Samsung products and wanted the Samsung Galaxy Tab to match her Samsung Galaxy phone. She tells me this tablet is great and she loves it. She said whatever her phone does, her tablet matches and sync it so she don't have to add or delete things twice. If she download an app to her phone it syncs to her tablet. Plus she can sync our Samsung TVs to watch movies or turn channels from her phone or tablet. Really need James Bond stuff, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Abstract Cool Shopper

customer_reviews.title: A Couple of Glitches, but All-in-All a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Really a top-flight device overall, but I had two problems, both of which were resolved: 1. WiFi didn't work, but Samsung fixed it within a week or two under warranty. 2. Android 4.4 does not support Adobe Flash, however the Dolphin browser app has a work-around that does support Adobe Flash. With these two fixes, the Galaxy Tab 4 is a terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: Pomme

customer_reviews.title: Very good table that does everything I want and need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tablet. Performs very well. Runs all my applications as well as any games my kid would like to play. Very nice large, crisp display. Screen response is great, even through the screen protector of my case. The one major issue is the location of the power plug. It is on the middle-bottom under the home button. This is pain, since there are times I will use it propped up while it is charging. This requires me to flip it upside down, and some of my applications will not run when the tablet is upside down.
customer_reviews.author: thedogmmm

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Hard to beat for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter. She has been quite happy with it. This was the second tablet I purchased for a relative. Both have been Tab 4's. The first has been in use a few months now and the second for a few weeks. Both were for Samsung phone users. The tablets are very easy to use, especially if you are already using a Samsung phone. Like most Samsung products, I believe they are too loaded with bloatware that we have no use for, but there is plenty of memory and the tablets don't seem to be slowed down by the addition of unwanted apps.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: My 2013 version Nexus 7 has had Lollipop for over a month and it is a better device now than the first day I bought it
customer_reviews.text: This unit works well; however, it is only Android version 4.4.2 with the update, not 4.4.4 (Kit Kat) or 5 (Lollipop). I only bought this unit a few months ago... Why is Samsung not supporting their devices with newer software? My 2013 version Nexus 7 has had Lollipop for over a month and it is a better device now than the first day I bought it. I am a Samsung product fan... I own their chromebook, S5 phone, 5 of their tv's and the smartgear watch. It is sad they do not provide timely updates.
customer_reviews.author: plautus001

customer_reviews.title: ... I could work on it but all it's really good for is games or internet searching
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me thinking I could work on it but all it's really good for is games or internet searching. No USB or headset usage. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci

customer_reviews.title: Review 5 Years Later
customer_reviews.text: I picked this tablet up back in 2015 and it still works. I still use it everyday, mostly for YouTube and podcasts. I can't recall ever having a major problem with battery life, memory, or speed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. IV

customer_reviews.title: I love it! But I really
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! But I really , REALLY wish that Samsung had not compromised in the cameras to make it more mid to upper level so it's better affordability for a wider range of peepz. I am a DIE HARD Galaxy fan ! ....so I do love the wide range of accessibility, & the built in Kids Arena/one touch Parental pass control.but after being accustomed to such awwwwwsum cameras on all my previous Galaxys, the one on the Samsung Galaxy 4 Tablet 10 inch is just not up to par. Other than that,it would get 10 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Starring_U

customer_reviews.title: Really useful, works fine with apps
customer_reviews.text: Really useful, works fine with apps, really helpful for my job. The inconveniences I have found so far are: - The charging slot is in the bottom, so it gets complicated to place it on its own (in a folding case) and watch or use the tablet while charging it. - The screen resolution is ok, but not that great - it cannot send image to other devices, like I cannot connect it to a tv or datashow to reproduce image or video from my tablet. Not even with a micro USB to VGA or a micro USB to HDMI
customer_reviews.author: Gissele Mendoza Arias

customer_reviews.title: Great Product... Needs the cover accessory
customer_reviews.text: Does everything is supposed to do. It's awesome. If you like your Samsung Android phone... you'll enjoy having this. The WAWO is must. We wouldn't enjoy the tablet as much without the easle style stand.
customer_reviews.author: JJ in Clearwater

customer_reviews.title: Its a great family tablet.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't bog down like my motorolla xy board. The RAM is very efficient. The best feature is the different profiles. If you have kids you'll love having they're apps separate from yours. I don't have to worry about them getting into my work files when they have it. Its a great family tablet. The colors and brightness are also better than other tablets I've used.
customer_reviews.author: B.K. Burris

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very good condition and came in a timely manner. Tablet is working perfectly fine but needs charging fairly frequently and the picture quality is not up to standard for a Samsung. This coupled with the fact that it didn't come with a charger is why I gave it a four star rating. Product is otherwise fine and very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: BM Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my tablet! I bought a Bluetooth keyboard for it, and instead of toting around a laptop, along with books, for my nursing classes, I carry mainly just my tablet. It also can download PowerPoint's, so I can follow my instructor's lecture while adding my own notes. This is a great item for a student on the go!
customer_reviews.author: S.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, makes me want to chuck my iPad
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter, and she loves it. She watches Netflix and TWC on it. She plays games on it, she is only 7 so she is not using much other than that yet. The only issue is that Amazon does not support it for Amazon instant video. I was disappointed in that, but they say they are working on it. I like it also and think when my iPad dies I may just switch to Samsung myself. The thing I like is that you can put a micro SD card in to enlarge the storage capacity. You can't do that on an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Performer
customer_reviews.text: I am used to the iOS setup so learning the android way of doing things is taking a little getting used to. I use this a a backup to my laptop, replacement for my Kindle and everything in between. I added a 64GB memory card, and a bluetooth keyboard. For the money it is an unbeatable machine. Does go through battery power pretty quick and is relatively slow to charge. Perhaps not as exciting as the new ipad offerings but for a reasonably priced, durable workhorse I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love my tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I love my 10 inch Samsung Galaxy tab 4. I've had it for 8 months now and have not had any trouble with it. I like that you can put a memory card in it. Unfortunately it doesn't take very good pictures and doesn't have a flash. I would love to be able to transfer pictures from my phone to my tablet easier. I love the size of my tablet. The charging port location makes it difficult to use the tablet while it is charging (only because the cord is too short. Wish it had come with a longer cord). The screen mirroring feature is great :)
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Ok if expectations are set upfront...
customer_reviews.text: I like the tablet for the 1 year I've had it, but my two complaints are the processor and the delay in scrolling on the screen when searching the web. I'm not a fan of Apple, but when I compare the processor performance with my son's iPad his is much smoother when playing games (World of Tanks Blitz). If all you're doing is web searching and email, it's fine. Anything requiring more horsepower, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: craigp40

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy Tab 4 10.1
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my Galaxy Tab 2, and I do like it a lot. My reason for replacing the Tab 2 is because I could not get it to charge (kind of an expensive door stop). And I'm holding my breath on this one.....I can't get it to charge with a USB charger. It does do fine with the wall charger though. And that will work for me. It's going to take a while longer before I really trust it. The 10" screen is a great upgrade :-)
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 (10.1”)
customer_reviews.text: When in the market for a tablet I did a lot of looking around at all of the options out there and kept coming back to the Samsung Tab 4. While I liked other futures of other tablets, having a Samsung/Android phone the Tab 4 seemed like the right choice for me and I’m happy to say I made the right choice! If you are used to the Samsung/Android system you should have no problems using this tablet, I simply love it! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Zackattack123

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a device!
customer_reviews.text: Best Tablet I have used. Good hardware lots of apps and The 10.1 can't be beat. the voice apps are amazing. I do not have to type anything. Samsung has S-voice for task and navigation by speaking. Memo or S-Memo is also voice recognition beyond anything I have ever seen. Great for anyone any age. Samsung and Android are Killer combo.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Nations

customer_reviews.title: Works good as a picture gallery or eReader
customer_reviews.text: I bought and refurbished and it still works good though in the current year of 2019, it's resolution is very outdated but it works great as a eReader.
customer_reviews.author: Zaheer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tablet with some caviates
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is for my wife. She was using a Kindle Fire but wanted something with a larger screen. She really finds this tablet easy to use and just want she was looking for. She's only used it for a couple of weeks so far but really likes the size. The only draw back is that the camera isn't all that great. Only 3Mp. The pictures aren't that great. But everything else has been a real nice replacement for the Kindle.
customer_reviews.author: GStreet

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. This is our second one, (Tab 4) the other one is a Tab 3. I upgraded both with a Micro SD card. Easy, then moved some applications to it. All the photos are automatically put on the SD card. I am still practicing with "S Voice" to speak and it will type for me. The screen is a little different than the Tab 3. Improved somewhat. So any way I would recommend these Tabs over the I Pad any day!!
customer_reviews.author: J.L.W.

customer_reviews.title: It's my new favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: It's my new favorite toy!! Had the Galaxy tab 2 for a few years and it's still going, I figured it was time for an upgrade a treat for myself. I am enjoying the 10.1 Galaxy tab 4 that much more. My son and I can go sit in his room with it, I can play cooking shows in the kitchen, I can hide in my bedroom with it, and no matter who is hogging the TV, I can pop on my own program and or PDF and have me some mommy time.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Wors good for the pricegreat tablet Can do a lot with this I am happy thank you I watch movies play games fast shipping Thank you
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my adolescent son to use in his technical drawing class in high school. As soon as he took it out of the box charged it, he started loading educational apps onto it. The scientific calculator app was under $5, I paid over $120 for the same calculator several years ago to use in my college math classes. This is a great tablet for high school kids and older! I would purchase this item again and recommend it to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Thorington

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. I was previously using the Nook tablet. This one is much quicker. The keyboard is annoying, but I'm not going to deduct stars because of it. I love the big screen. It isn't too heavy. I wanted something that would be quick so I could do my school work on it, this is perfect for that. It also stores a good amount of pictures, too. I love this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Feldt

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for beginners with so many additional features for those who more experienced.
customer_reviews.text: My first Android tablet and I am so happy I purchased it, especially while it was on sale. It is user-friendly, and makes using a tablet fun. Although the user interface is not as easy as Mac products, if you use it for the basics, it is easy to figure out after a few hours. Screen is very clear. Nice for wi-fi household activities such as Netflix and surfing the Internet. The camera is easy to use and nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Asian87

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Even though i haven't gotten it yet and it will be here on Friday, Dec 27th, i feel that i will love it I have a tab 3 that's messed up and doesn't work right so i am just thrilled that I got this new tab 4 coming and i can't wait to use it been looking for another tablet for a long time and finally it is on it's way i can't wait
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Smith

customer_reviews.title: GREAT tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my tab 4 for a couple of months now and I'm VERY happy with it! I'm glad I went with the tab 4 and in this size. It's easy to use, runs smoothly and quickly, has nice bright colors, etc. I love the kid's system it has built into it too, making it easy and enjoyable for even my toddler to use it. I bought a 64 gb micro sd card and extended the memory by a lot. Again, very glad I chose Samsung :-)
customer_reviews.author: Crispy89

customer_reviews.title: ... is my third Galaxy tab and this one works great just like all of the others
customer_reviews.text: this is my third Galaxy tab and this one works great just like all of the others. Just wanted to point out that the charging cable provided by Samsung is only 24 inches long. At that length it doesn't reach some of the places I'd like to place my tablet while charging. Just one of those dumb manufacturer decisions that annoy people when they have an otherwise excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve300

customer_reviews.title: Good Device
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a father's day present to my dad. He is very pleased with it. He mostly browses the web, YouTube's, and Facebook's. It works great for that. I give 4 stars because the product details states that the device is in Korean, but instructions in English will be provided to change default language. No such instructions existed. I had to tinker and figure out how to do that with Korean symbols.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Sessions

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband. He is delighted and pleased with the clarity of the screen and easy of maneuvering of the tablet. I am pleased with timely delivery. I may get one for myself. Now I have surface rt. But I do like this tablet for just games and Google playstore. He feels the 16gbs is more than enough storage for his needs. Weight feels good to carry not to bulky. Would recommend this tablet to others.
customer_reviews.author: sn

customer_reviews.title: Toughest Tab In TEXAS
customer_reviews.text: What I like the most is it is indestructible ...my sister is a pre tech child or the 60s and really challenged on the pc.She could break or lock up anything and as you know all tech ain't cheap!! This tab takes more punishment than toilet seat...and STILL comes back for more just fine.This would be a great tab for anyone...lots of speed and problem free...hope it helps, stagazer
customer_reviews.author: stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Mom is 89 but still smart as a whip
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mother for Mothers Day. Of course, when it arrived, I couldn't wait to give it to her. I got her all set up with her own Google accounts and she is so tickled. She had been using a Kindle Fire but with this she can do so much more. Mom is 89 but still smart as a whip. She picks up on new things very quickly. So glad she likes her gift. But its a Samsung and I knew she would.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: A good Android to start with...
customer_reviews.text: It has held up pretty well for 9 months. As an Ipad family the 12 year old took to Android well but Daddy has trouble fixing the glitches that come up. I had to take it apart about 7 months in when it froze, much easier to disassemble than Ipad. Works well, some issues with Battery percentage, there is some online help that makes the battery meter (and charging) work better. It isn't an Ipad but for the price, you get quite a machine.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 (10.1-Inch, Black)
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase for my 9 year old- who needed a tablet for school. We went with a Samsung as we prefer their products. It has worked well for us for over a year now. I love being able to setup more than one user on the tablet, as I am the owner and authorizer and he can use, but also have accounts for my daughters to use their own apps on their accounts.
customer_reviews.author: LYNNKS

customer_reviews.title: Great mid-level tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Nice decent mid-level tablet. Has a good heft and comes with android 4.0 which I already downloaded 5.0 when I connected to wifi. Standard touchwiz pros-cons. I do like how the volume button aligns with the screen. So basically right is always volume up and not the top volume up button if that makes any sense. Bought for a gift for fathers day so perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: P N

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tablet. It is easy to use and is much lighter than my old tablet. It is much easier to check my emails, play games. etc. My daughter told me about this tablet and I am glad that I got it. I would tell anyone who is looking for a nice tablet to purchase this one.
customer_reviews.author: The Scooter Lady

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Device
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this refurbished product and it came with no instruction booklet. But the product is very similiar to the Samsung phones so it didn't take long to get up and working with the device. We've had the device for one month and no issues have come up. The screen is large and easier to read than a small phone screen. We purchased this to use instead of a laptop to search the web and read emails we really love it for those purposes.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: love my galaxy tab 4
customer_reviews.text: Love love love samsung products. The tab 4 10 inch is amazing. I rarely get on my laptop anymore. This is the 2nd tab 4 I have purchased. We have 5 galaxy tabs of different generations and they all still work amazingly. I am a life long samsung galaxy owner and will never go to the "other guys". Everything you can think of downloading is available either through Google play or the Samsung app store.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn A

customer_reviews.title: Everything one would expcect from a Samsung tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet. Upgraded from a Tab to Tab 4. It may not be the latest here in 2017, but it has all the power needed to run the current apps without bogging down, and the visuals are Samsung super. Yes it is only 16 GB. but with an SD socket, it's all I could need.
customer_reviews.author: Videographicsman

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice size and seems to be a good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband. He loves it. It's a nice size and seems to be a good quality. I am not tech savvy, but I like Samsung products and this one seems to have everything he needs in a tablet. He's using it in replacement for his laptop that has been taken over by our little niece. I think he likes the portability of the tablet better.
customer_reviews.author: PLD

customer_reviews.title: Samsung's quality is continually evident
customer_reviews.text: We had the first edition of this tablet. Now, we graduated to this newer iteration and Samsung's quality is continually evident. My dad loves this tablet, it's easy to use, easy to read, intuitive, fast, great quality. It's a bit costly; you can buy lower cost tablets nowadays, but we wanted the reliability and longevity that our older Samsung offered us.
customer_reviews.author: Rosh

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this refurbished. Came in great condition. No scratches on screen or anywhere else. My other tablet is a 7 inch kindle and this is a huge improvement. The only complaint I have is that the battery life isn't that great. I'm thinking it's because it's a refurbished one and Mayberry the battery is kinda old.
customer_reviews.author: Anarchist8

customer_reviews.title: Died in under a year
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even had it a year and it is taking over night for it to charge. Then when I use it, the battery rapidly goes down, even when it is plugged in, it still goes dead. This is not worth the money. I liked it and enjoyed the convenience, but I can't justify spending over 200.00 for less than a year. Pfffffftttt Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S, prime member

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a Samsung what more can I say works well can't beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Bigdog57

customer_reviews.title: This is a great add to my travel and take too work use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great add to my travel and take too work use. I added the 64GB card also for storage. Works well with my Samsung S 5 phone and links easily to my wifi equipment and public (hotels etc}. The size is great for watching movies. I get about 4 hours of movie time to hit 30% battery level. Charges fast too.
customer_reviews.author: billj

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 4
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 for a little over a month now and I am very satisfied with it so far. I got this tablet after an extensive research on the different tabs on the market. This one seems to work just fine for what I need it for. I got it to use along with my laptop, the price was a good deal also. It takes good pictures, better than my wife's tablet. The wife likes this tablet so I may be buying her one to replace the one she has.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS TABLET!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS TABLET!!! It is easy to operate and functions extremely well. Easy to learn the operation of it. So happy that I made the choice to purchase this tablet instead of some of the others I was considering. My husband also purchased the Galaxy Tab 4, 10.1 and is extremely happy with this tablet as well. It was a good choice, and definitely kinder to your wallet. Thank you, Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: LH Shops

customer_reviews.title: good deal, easy  to use.
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this tablet. I bought it to replace my Galaxy tab 2 10.1 Price is good speed is excellent just wish I could have gotten the 32 gigs for more storage space. I do have an SD card installed as well. Very similar to what I have on my other tablet. Only some of the software is different. Plus it's a newer model.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn hill

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister who has never used a computer and is just starting to learn. Can't go wrong with this tablet, especially for a newbie like her. It's large enough for her to see with her weak eyes and light enough for her nimble fingers. The screen is crisp and clear as well. The price is exceptional for this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Lishca

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet through Amazon Warehouse Deals. It was in absolutely perfect condition and I saved quite a bit of money on it, which makes it a definite win-win. I love the tablet and it's a HUGE improvement over my old Galaxy Tab 2. I'm really happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Marte

customer_reviews.title: Using the micro card has certainly expanded the storage and made it easy to store a large volume of music files and ...
customer_reviews.text: absolutely thrilled with the tablet. Still getting used to it but would purchase another. Using the micro card has certainly expanded the storage and made it easy to store a large volume of music files and photos. I use it fort business so having access to photos of what I paint to show people is important.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A. Herchenrader

customer_reviews.title: It is different getting used to a new system but I love it! it is easy switching to different screens ...
customer_reviews.text: Still learning on the tablet. It is different getting used to a new system but I love it! it is easy switching to different screens and multi-tasking. It is compact enough to take with you and you have the full benefit of all your computer functions! Great device! I recommend this to anyone who is looking for a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Tremblay

customer_reviews.title: looks great, doesn't work that well
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice, however not able to transfer media from my main comp to this tablet. Apparently it's a known random issue. Might be sending back very soon is no solution is found. (this is a refurb and I have a strong feeling this is why it was sent back in the first place.)
customer_reviews.author: tobusytothinkofsomethingclever

customer_reviews.title: Good Tablet if you dont need phone service included.
customer_reviews.text: Using this tablet on Wi-Fi only isn't bad at all for me since the only two places I use it have Wi-Fi. The screen resolution is as exactly advertised and video playback has been a great experience. I don't use many apps on my tablet but the ones I do you utilize work well. I recommend restarting your tablet every few days. Battery life is exceptionally awesome. in standby mode the battery barely uses any juice, and I have used the tablet on accession for several hours of constant gameplay and battery only got to as low as 30%
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is a good product, be aware of vendors.
customer_reviews.text: I always enjoyed samsung products, I got this for my nephew for christmas, it worked for a month then died.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Walker

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I have a bad experience buying this product. It stoped working after four days and I contacted to return, it has been more that 2 weeks that they have not refunded me.
customer_reviews.author: sahd

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved it and she normally gets ipad and iphone devices
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved it and she normally gets ipad and iphone devices. Got this for her as a present. She finally opened her eyes and realize you can do much more with android than with ipad, as ipads are more restrictive. She uses it for school for typing and reading books. The Battery last a long time. My wife is constantly streaming tv from it.
customer_reviews.author: icorona1015

customer_reviews.title: Okay beginer tablet, but would reccomend buying Tab 3 instead.
customer_reviews.text: It is okay for the price so long as you get it around $200-$250. Just remember to buy a micro SD card. the resolution isn't great, but it is decent. The same goes with the camera. I thought that buy buying the newest model I was getting the best, but the Tab 3 is WAY better. That is why I am only giving this 3 stars out of 5
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Davis

customer_reviews.title: The best it's been the best I purchased and it's my ...
customer_reviews.text: The best it's been the best I purchased and it's my baby. The only con is I have to turn up sound when watching or playing music but I still love it better then small on for the speed and I can print like laptop. Love it more then a laptop because I had one that crashed. This tablet is so fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Julia weber

customer_reviews.title: I liked it but I was always worried I might drop ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but I was always worried I might drop it, it is so light it is scary, so if you have one definitely get a protective cover or case for it. The color of the screen is good but I still do prefer the tab galaxy 9.7 screen and resolution to this one. The 10.1 inch is a plus, bigger screen. I like to design, and in the color white it looks slick!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. This is my second Samsung Galaxy Tab 4, my husband took over my first one. Battery life is great works fast.
customer_reviews.author: Bigfan59

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a Christmas gift for my 9 year old daughter. She has not had the chance to see it or use it. The adults however, LOVE it. We have been playing on it almost nightly after she goes to bed. We also picked up a wireless keyboard with a case for this so that she can use it as a laptop. I do not regret this purchase and I am expecting my daughter to love it just as much as us!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan F.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is only my second tablet. Bought a D2 about a year ago before I had access to my own in-house WIFI. I was looking for a high resolution large screen tablet, quad core, & expandable memory. The Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 exceeded my expectations. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Samsung tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is a nice size with a beautiful picture. Easy to sync with his Samsung phone. He wanted the black tablet, but it's $30 more. The white is o.k., but it came set-up in Korean! Sometimes it still comes up in Korean when using Google. Some things cannot be changed to English.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Davenport

customer_reviews.title: JUNK WARRANTY SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: THE TABLET IS GREAT BUT THE EXTENDED WARRANTY I SPENT 37.95 FOR A EXTENDED WARRANTY AND I HAD A SOFTWARE ISSUE WHERE IT WOULD NOT EXCEPT MY PASSWORD CONTACT TRADE SQUARE THEY SAID THE SOFTWARE ISSUED WHERE NOT COVER. THIS TABLET IS 1 YEAR OLD NEVER BEEN DROPPED OR ANYTHING AND NOW ITS JUNK RIGHT AFTER THE MANUFACTUREDWARRANTY IS NO GOOD.
customer_reviews.author: ernie

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. We had an apple before and I was not impressed with it. I am using this tablet for school (to read my text books on and to write my assignments). Is very easy to work with and easy to transport. I love it so much I bought a second one for my 11 year old. He is using it for games mostly :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is solid
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, this is going to be short and simple. Bought the tablet for my mom. She has been using it since Christmas. Seems to be happy. I have helped her learn the new tablet and everything has run smoothly. It is easy to use and runs faster than the cheaper tablets I have purchased. I like the extra software that Samsung includes with their tablets. My wife has the 7 inch version and loves it also.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W. Schreck

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this tablet; I'll recommend it to anyone looking for all around purposes like e-mail, picture taking, staying in touch via social media and so on. I mainly use it for downloading videos and and books from jw.org; it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: GHGarzon

customer_reviews.title: Great QUALIITY entry level tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Seems a little slower than my Asus that I accidentally dropped. Overall, a great product, and yes, i would buy again! I have not had any software issues as I did with Asus MeMO-Pad-FHD-10. Working with spreadsheet for purchasing, the Asus would sometimes lose my information! Samsung is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Donna G.

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I especially like that I can drag files into the tablet rather than go through iTunes. It also easily connects with my desktop via bluetooth to transfer files wirelessly. Great tablet for everyday use. I also have an iPad air, but end up using the Samsung more, just because it is easier.
customer_reviews.author: David Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Use it mostly for kid games and browsing. Camera is meh. I had a problem with it about 2 months after purchase, was still under samsungs warranty so they covered shipping and fixed it promptly. Sound is good and so far it hasn't froze or anything. I just hope it last longer but great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Katk

customer_reviews.title: Has performed very well
customer_reviews.text: Recommended in an online review of the best tablets. Has performed very well. It has no extra sensors (GPS, compass etc.) just a few motion detectors. I got this larger version for my wife, who will be using it primarily at home or in hotel rooms when travelling. I have the eight inch version and like it just as much.
customer_reviews.author: DIY and Gadgets

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 (10.1-Inch 16GB, White)
product_meta.description:
AT A GLANCE:
 * High-resolution, 10.1-inch display for vivid detail
 * Watch movies, play games, read, browse the web, and more
 * IR blaster allows you to use tablet as universal remote
 * Search TV listings and receive recommendations
 * Share your tablet with multi-user mode
 * Switch to Kids Mode for a colorful, easy-to-use interface
 * Rear and front cameras for photos and video chat
 * Add up to 64 GB memory with microSD slot
 * Easily multitask with two apps using Multi Window
 * Lightweight, portable design

WIDESCREEN DISPLAY FOR HOURS OF IMMERSIVE ENTERTAINMENT
BRILLIANT, HIGH-RESOLUTION DISPLAY FOR EXCEPTIONAL DETAIL
Ideal for watching HD movies, playing games, browsing the web, or reading, the Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 features a 10.1-inch, 1280x800 resolution screen, so you experience rich graphics, bright colors, and crisp text.

RECEIVE PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS WITH WATCHON
The WatchON feature lets you type in your zip code and cable provider to browse and search current TV listings and get personalized recommendations based on your viewing history.

FUNCTIONS AS A UNIVERSAL REMOTE CONTROL
The Galaxy Tab 4 has a built-in IR blaster, which allows you to use the tablet as a universal remote control.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR PREFERENCES AND SHARE YOUR EXPERIENCES
SHARE YOUR TABLET WITH MULTI-USER MODE
Great for sharing your tablet with family members, multi-user mode lets you add up to eight profiles. This allows up to eight different users to log in separately, so you each see only your own apps, backgrounds, and email.

KIDS MODE OFFERS A CHILD-FRIENDLY INTERFACE
Create a separate profile for your kids and switch to Kids Mode--a child-friendly interface that is fun and easy to control. Parents can track the time their kids spend and even set preferences to manage which features their children can access.

BUILT-IN CAMERAS FOR PHOTOS AND VIDEO CHAT
Equipped with a 3-megapixel rear camera and a 1.3-megapixel front camera, the Galaxy Tab 4 lets you take photos and video chat with friends and family members.

Watch your videos on a crisp, high-resolution display. View Larger.

Use two apps at once on the same screen. View Larger.

EXPANDABLE MEMORY AND EASY MULTITASKING
LIGHTWEIGHT, PORTABLE DESIGN
At only 0.31 inches thick and weighing 1 pound, the Galaxy Tab 4 is comfortable to hold and convenient to take with you wherever you go.

EXPANDABLE MEMORY TO STORE PHOTOS, MUSIC, AND VIDEOS
The tablet offers 16 GB of onboard memory and includes a microSD card slot that allows you to add up to 64 GB of additional memory, making it easy to store more songs, videos, photos, and games.

USE TWO APPLICATIONS AT ONCE
With the Multi Window feature, you can place two applications side by side and drag content from one app to the other. You can even open the same app twice, which is handy if you're writing two email messages or want to reference two websites side by side.

FREE CONTENT WITH GALAXY PERKS
COMES WITH SIRIUSXM, DROPBOX STORAGE, AND MORE
With Galaxy Perks you'll receive free content and services, including three months of SiriusXM Internet Radio for new users, three audiobooks from Audible for new users, 50 GB of Dropbox space, and more.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 10.1, USB charging cable, wall adapter, and quick start guide.

Take photos with a 3-megapixel rear camera. View Larger.



AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Korean version - but seller has included instruction manual (in English) regarding how to change the default language settings and also contains a US power adapter
Android 4.4 Kit Kat OS, 1.2 GHz quad-core Qualcomm processor ; 16 GB Flash Memory, 1.5 GB RAM Memory and battery life is up to 10 hours
64GB of memory available through a microSD slot and 50GB of free Dropbox storage
Comes with over $300 of free content and services

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,770 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
